text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ

translation.en.sahih: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And to Allah will [all] matters be returned.
translation.id.indonesian: Kepunyaan Allah-lah segala yang ada di langit dan di bumi; dan kepada Allahlah dikembalikan segala urusan.
